Title: User Login with Valid Credentials
Precondition: User account exists and is active
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter valid username
3. Enter valid password
4. Click Login button
Expected Result: User is redirected to dashboard and sees welcome message

Title: User Login with Invalid Password
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter valid username
3. Enter invalid password
4. Click Login button

Title: Password Reset Flow
Test Steps:
1. Click 'Forgot Password' link
2. Enter registered email
3. Click 'Send Reset Link' button
4. Check email inbox
5. Click reset link in email
6. Enter new password
7. Confirm new password
8. Click 'Reset Password'
Expected Result: User receives success message and can login with new password

Title: User Logout
Test Steps:
1. Click user profile icon
2. Select 'Logout' option
3. Confirm logout action
Expected Result: User is redirected to login page and session is cleared

Title: Shopping Cart - Add Item
Precondition: User is logged in and viewing product catalog
Test Steps:
1. Browse product catalog
2. Select a product
3. Choose quantity
4. Click 'Add to Cart' button
5. View cart
Expected Result: Product appears in cart with correct quantity and price

Title: Shopping Cart - Remove Item
Test Steps:
1. View shopping cart
2. Click 'Remove' button next to item
3. Confirm removal
Expected Result: Item is removed from cart and total price is updated

Title: Checkout Process - Valid Payment
Precondition: User has items in cart and valid payment method
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to cart
2. Click 'Proceed to Checkout'
3. Enter shipping address
4. Select shipping method
5. Enter payment details
6. Click 'Place Order'
Expected Result: Order confirmation page displayed, order number generated, confirmation email sent

Title: Search Product by Name
Test Steps:
1. Enter product name in search box
2. Click 'Search' button
Expected Result: Matching products are displayed in results

Title: Filter Products by Category
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to product catalog
2. Select category from filter menu
3. Apply filter
Expected Result: Only products in selected category are displayed

Title: User Profile Update
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Profile page
2. Click 'Edit Profile'
3. Update name and email
4. Click 'Save Changes'
Expected Result: Profile is updated and success message displayed
